headline: Ohio Court Could Hold Redistricting Panel in Contempt Over Maps Dispute
author: Patricia McKnight
sentences: The Brennan Center for Justice and co-counsel filed a motion Friday asking the Supreme Court to enforce its order of the commission "to show cause why they should not be held in contempt of court, with appropriate remedies to follow."
